ingredients.ingredient: 3 tablespoons heavy whipping cream, or as needed
1 slice smoked salmon, cut into strips
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Separate egg white from yolk carefully and whip white until soft peaks form
Layer salmon and whipped egg white for airy texture
Bake just until white is set but yolk remains runny
enrichment.coachingPrompt: The whipped egg white creates a souffl√©-like cloud. Fold gently to preserve air, then bake until barely set.
